titleStmt.title: An Exact account of the tryal of Algernoon Sidney who was tryed at the Kings-Bench-Bar at Westminster this present Wednesday, being the twenty fifth of November for conspiring the death of the King, and His Royal Highness, of which he was convicted
titleStmt.author: Sidney, Algernon, 1622-1683, defendant.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
